summary: Just a flat version of the main menu :)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=4][size=5]If nothing happens when you installed it from the NMM, install it manually or with Mod Organizer, it should work[/size] (both tested)
[color=#000000][size=2]I had this issue when I was testing, so please if you download, add a comment if you have or not this problem too ^^

[/size][/color][/size][/color][size=5]Check the files section for different colors! :)


[/size][color=#ff0000][size=4]/!\ COLORS MAY BE CHANGED IF YOU USE AN ENB /!\
[/size][/color]

In fact, I was tired of my Windows Wallpaper, so I made this one: [url=http://imgur.com/3MREyzs]16/3 Flat Skyrim Wallpaper
[/url]
Then, I thought that it could be a nice main menu for Skyrim, so I re-cropped it for single 1080p monitor and followed this tutorial to make this tiny mod:

[youtube]IGJnHTswXwA[/youtube]

Like the author of the video, I used this mod for the logo.nif file ;)
[b]
[/b][b]Main Menu Wallpaper Replacer HD 1080p now With Randomizer[/b] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1535027/?][b]hellstorm102[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3708/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3708/[/url]

It's not really amazing but I'm not a pro in GFX and even less in modding x')
author: Wolfiy
